resources.string: You don\'t have any favorites yet!\nGo to the Verses tab and tap the heart ❤️

string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: "For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope. - Jeremiah 29:11"
"I can do all things through him who strengthens me. - Philippians 4:13"
"Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and do not lean on your own understanding. - Proverbs 3:5"
"The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want. - Psalm 23:1"
"Be strong and courageous. Do not be frightened, and do not be dismayed, for the Lord your God is with you wherever you go. - Joshua 1:9"
